summary: Two regressions in form handling: default values broken for x-form-urlencoded and multipart forms when migrating from v0.112.4 to v0.115.11.
symptoms: Empty string submitted in form returns '' instead of None default
Default values ignored for Optional form fields
Regression in x-form-urlencoded handling from PR #12134
Regression in multipart form handling from PR #12117
suspected_root_cause: PR #12134 and #12117 changed form field extraction logic, removing checks for empty fields and re-adding body fields blindly
